title: Visualizing national healthcare problems
description: An interactive healthcare story engine that helps scientists showcase their work in context of national problem sets and information.

title: Design-a-Lamp
description: An interactive installation allowing museum visitors to design and illuminate their own Tiffany lamp creation.

title: Care Over Clicks
description: Refocusing nursing on what matters — Building an EHR tailored to the needs of home-care agencies.

title: Flux Notes
description: Capturing structured health data at the point of care without increasing clinician burden.

title: TileTap
description: Market research surveys reimagined. We designed new ways to onboard, engage, and retain panelists.

title: Designing for Prior Authorization
description: Faster approvals, better outcomes. Software design for efficient, more intelligent protocol review, saving time and burden for insurers, providers, and hospitals.
client: A Leader in cancer care management

title: Where Your Health Dollars Go
description: An interactive map that tracks the origin, flow, and destination of money through the US healthcare system.

title: Digital Stacks
description: The Digital Stacks are a window onto the continually growing collection of materials the Boston Public Library has digitized.

title: Welcome Center
description: Six unique interactive experiences delighted and informed patrons at the newly renovated Boston Public Library Johnson Building.

title: SamaSama — Conductors
description: Conductors was an attraction for SamaSama, an interactive audiovisual theme park full of attractions where players interact in groups to create music.
